mapper.select: SELECT Id as id, UserId as userId, VideoId as videoId, Emails as emails, ShareDate as shareDate FROM Share
SELECT Id as id, UserId as userId, VideoId as videoId, Emails as emails, ShareDate as shareDate FROM Share WHERE Id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Share (UserId, VideoId, Emails, ShareDate) VALUES (#{userId}, #{videoId}, #{emails}, #{shareDate})
